title: Himi 199
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
’A e kakai angatonu,
‘Oku mou ‘ilo ‘a Sīsū
Kapau kuo mou tu’u hake,
Fakataha pē mo ia.
2.
Mou fakahā lelei atu,
Hono fu’u mālohi lahi,
‘O ‘ene toetu’u hake,
‘I he fiefia lahi.
3.
Fakahā ho’omou tui
‘Aki ‘a e anga molū,
Homou fakamolemole,
‘I he ngaahi ngāue lelei.
4.
Pea ke mou kumi atu
Ki he me’a ‘i ‘olunga,
Pea muimui atu
Kia Sīsū ki hēvani.
5.
Ko homou Fakamo’ui,
Kuo fakahikihiki,
Ki he nima to’omata’u,
‘O e Tamai Māfimafi.
6.
Pea mou vakai ma’u ai pē
Ki homou Fakamo’ui,
Ko e ‘Eiki taupotu,
‘I hēvani mo māmani.
7.
‘Oku ‘Afio fai ma’u pē,
Ki he potu toputapu,
‘I he maama ‘i ‘olunga,
Ko e Pule, ta’engata. *
